member.name: P:Chen.ClassicItems.Distortion.distortSkill

member.summary: Singleton artifact class powered by TILER2 that implements the Artifact of Origin functionality.

member.name: F:Chen.ClassicItems.Origin.originSuffix
member.summary: The suffix appended on the Imps spawned by Artifact of Origin. Might be useful if one wants to fetch the objects related to these Imps through their name.

member.summary: The drop table used for determining the Imp Vanguard's drops.

member.name: P:Chen.ClassicItems.Origin.originImpSpawnCard
member.summary: The Spawn Card of the Imp Soldier.

member.summary: Singleton artifact class powered by TILER2 that implements Artifact of Spirit functionality.

member.name: T:Chen.ClassicItems.ClassicItemsPlugin
member.summary: Mother plugin of this mod that is responsible for loading items.

member.summary: This mod's version.

member.summary: This mod's name.

member.name: T:Chen.ClassicItems.DroneRepairKit
member.summary: Singleton equipment class powered by TILER2 that implements Drone Repair Kit functionality.

member.name: P:Chen.ClassicItems.DroneRepairKit.regenBuff
member.summary: The regen buff associated with the Drone Repair Kit to be given to affected drones.

member.name: M:Chen.ClassicItems.DroneRepairKit.SupportCustomDrone(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a support for a custom drone so that Drone Repair Kit also heals and applies regen to them.
member.param: The CharacterMaster name of the drone.
member.returns: True if the drone is supported. False if it is already supported.

member.name: M:Chen.ClassicItems.DroneRepairKit.UnsupportCustomDrone(System.String)
member.summary: Removes support for a custom drone, thus removing them from Drone Repair Kit's scope.
member.param: The CharacterMaster name of the drone.
member.returns: True if the drone is unsupported. False if it is already unsupported.

member.name: P:Chen.ClassicItems.MortarTube.mortarPrefab
member.summary: Contains the mortar projectile prefab. Must invoke SetupMortarProjectile() for it to be initialized.

member.name: M:Chen.ClassicItems.MortarTube.SetupMortarProjectile
member.summary: Sets up the mortar projectile. Always invoke the method if one needs to borrow the mortar prefab.
